author: chirino
msg: Adding a little more delay so it works with slower machines.

author: jleroux
msg: As we have no better solutions for now, I put back -Duser.language=en

author: jstrachan
msg: fixed failing camel tests; made the CamelEndpointLoader dependent on the EnhancedConnection interface so it works with a naked ActiveMQConnection or a PooledConnection. Also changed the defaults to use a PooledConnectionFactory by default when using the ActiveMQ camel component

author: scheu
msg: Changed Part.getSize() to return a long instead of an int.
Made other associated changes in Axiom.
This is an internal interface, so the change in the method signature is safe.  I ran Axis2 to verify.

author: imario
msg: VERY nasty bug where IE wasn't able to finish its event in case of "onchange" due to wrongly "return false" - this will lead to totally screw up that browser!
fixed duplicate even attaching in case of ppr
